Test Name: MVISTA Histoplasma Antigen Quantitative, Spinal Fluid
Purpose: Quantitative measurement of Histoplasma antigen in spinal fluid to aid in the diagnosis and management of histoplasmosis.
Container: Sterile screw-cap tube/vial for CSF collection
Equipment: MVISTA Histoplasma Ag Quantitative test system, microcentrifuge, adjustable pipettes, vortex mixer, timer
